thread.title: Podcast: Bulldogs moving on from Alabama loss, taking a look at Tennessee
thread.title_full: Podcast: Bulldogs moving on from Alabama loss, taking a look at Tennessee

author: Marc Weiszer
title: Podcast: Bulldogs moving on from Alabama loss, taking a look at Tennessee
text:
Is the hangover from the Alabama loss over? 
We are less than 48 hours from kickoff now for Georgia-Tennessee. 
We will look back one more time from the fallout from the showing against the Crimson Tide and then move ahead. 
Marc Weiszer and Fletcher Page of the Athens Banner-Herald also talk quarterbacks, special teams among other topics on today's show. 
We will welcome in Patrick Brown of the Chattanooga Times-Free Press to give us the lowdown on a Tennessee team that needs a win Saturday as much as Georgia. Are things so bad that they would welcome Lane Kiffin back? 
Click below to listen to it all.
